name: Blue Alien v3
description:
Like the blue one, but using Sasami flavouring as the main base.

V2 was very close to the real thing, but with less cooling once steeped, so adding some WS-23 (I'm using a 30% solution, so tweak the percentage of you have a different dilution) in to the mix.

Also can't find any of the Boysenberry I was using, so I've switched it to the FLV one. ;)
author: VapeCreative

reviews.text: Where are you getting the Blue Alien? I was looking at Chefs but they don't have it..
